alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Cheyenne; Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 6:25PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Box Butte, eastern Cheyenne and eastern Morrill Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 525 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Alliance to near Lorenzo. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alliance, Sidney, Lodgepole, Dalton, Gurley, Colton, Sunol, Alliance Airport, The Intersection Of Highway 385 And 92, Sidney Airport and Broadwater. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 56 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
